mapper.insert: insert into gp_gp( gpmc, jrkpj, zrspj, dqjg, jrzgj, jrzdj, jmj , jmmj, cjgps, cjje, m1sq, m1bj, m2sq, m2bj, m3sq, m3bj, m4sq, m4bj, m5sq, m5bj, mm1sq, mm1bj, mm2sq, mm2bj, mm3sq, mm3bj, mm4sq, mm4bj, mm5sq, mm5bj, rq , sj ) values( #{gpmc}, #{jrkpj}, #{zrspj}, #{dqjg}, #{jrzgj}, #{jrzdj}, #{jmj}, #{jmmj}, #{cjgps}, #{cjje}, #{m1sq}, #{m1bj}, #{m2sq}, #{m2bj}, #{m3sq}, #{m3bj}, #{m4sq}, #{m4bj}, #{m5sq}, #{m5bj}, #{mm1sq}, #{mm1bj}, #{mm2sq}, #{mm2bj}, #{mm3sq}, #{mm3bj}, #{mm4sq}, #{mm4bj}, #{mm5sq}, #{mm5bj}, #{rq}, #{sj})
